BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 100259Z SEP
   BY M/V WESTERN NEPTUNE TOWING 12 3.5 MILE
   LONG CABLES AND M/V GECO DIAMOND TOWING
   250 METER LONG CABLE IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-23.65S 040-51.54W, 22-55.05S 039-55.87W,
   22-20.85S 038-44.10W, 22-41.94S 038-20.02W,
   23-49.01S 040-03.45W, 22-58.50S 041-15.81W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 100359Z SEP.
